article_headline: “We chose these computers because they have good graphics
article_text: and sound capabilities,’’ he added. The children like the computers for a variety of reasons. Kim, 6, said she likes to type on the computer. “But my favorite part is Winnie the Pooh,’’ she said, referring to the graphics. Said Brock, 11, “It helps me with my school work a lot.’’ Then Brock launched into a discussion with his tutor explaining why he agrees with Darwin’s theory of natural selection.
